comments: The next term has 116 digits. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 17 2015
mathematica: f[n_]:=n!-n; lst={};Do[If[PrimeQ[f[n+1]-f[n]],AppendTo[lst,f[n+1]-f[n]]],{n,0,5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 27 2009 *)Select[#[[2]]-#[[1]]-1&/@Partition[Range[100]!,2,1],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 17 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
